description.p: Latest: A 16-year-old boy was stabbed to death in Hayes, west London, on 24 May.

item.title: The murder of Michael Agyare: Suspect ‘hiding in Turkey’

description.p: Detectives told an inquest that the Turkish authorities refuse to extradite the man believed responsible for the fatal stabbing of a 24-year-old construction worker in Kingston-Upon-Thames

item.title: The death of Amanda Gretton: ‘We have many unanswered questions’

description.p: Police launched a murder investigation after the body of a 57-year-old artist was found in a disused garage seven weeks after she was reported missing. Her family told an inquest they were still waiting for a resolution after nearly 5 years.

The post

appeared first on
